column4: Hm so, when loading now I get an error: "Failed to load GLX extension (Nvidia X driver not found) ; even though ive installed nvidia-legacy and the linux-restricted...-nvidia-legacy packages.. It also says its "Ignoring request to load GLCore"But doesnt give a reason... Any ideas?
what Device line do you have in your xorg.conf ?
sec im command line so cant paste lol
Which line exactly did you want?
in Section "Device" the Driver line, it should say "nvidia" and also have a line in there Option "RenderAccel" "true"
Now when I restart X it says "Failed to insert kernel module nvidia" or something
you are trying it with sudo right?
